mapper.insert: insert into sport_advertisement (name, url, website, type, createDate) values ( #{name}, #{url}, #{website}, #{type}, now())
mapper.update: update sport_advertisement set website=#{website}, url=#{url}, name=#{name}, updateDate=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name, url, website, type from sport_advertisement
select id, name, url, website, type from sport_advertisement where id=#{id}
